class MetridocLiquibase

Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: tbarker Date: 7/30/11 Time: 12:51 PM runs a liquibase migration. Used liquibase.integration.spring.SpringLiquibase as a template to get this to work

java.lang.String contexts
a comma separated list of liquibase contexts to load. Please see liquibase documentation to see information on contexts. By default it is null, which runs all of them
